name: Top 3 Earners Within Department
query:
WITH ranked_employees AS (
    SELECT
        emp_name,
        phone_no,
        age,
        department,
        salary,
        RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department ORDER BY salary DESC) AS dept_rank
    FROM
        `tabEmployee Details`
)

SELECT
    emp_name AS "ID:Link/Employee Details:120",
    phone_no AS "Phone:Data:120",
    age AS "Age:Int:80",
    department AS "Department:Data:100",
    salary AS "Salary:Currency:100",
    dept_rank AS "Rank in Dept:Int:80"
FROM
    ranked_employees
WHERE
    dept_rank <=3
ORDER BY
    department, dept_rank
